effect.u_message: Proficiency progressed - You are beginning to grasp a general idea of how elements and compounds react with each other..
Proficiency progressed - You are beginning to gain a general idea of how various living beings function..
Proficiency progressed - Knowledge of the branch of chemistry that studies and uses carbon-containing compounds..
Proficiency progressed - Knowledge of the branch of chemistry that studies and uses compounds not containing carbon..
Proficiency progressed - The understanding of the chemistry of living things..
Proficiency progressed - An in-depth understanding of how humans and animals operate..
Proficiency progressed - You are beginning to grasp a general idea of how alien and post-Cataclysm mutated creatures function and operate..
Proficiency progressed - You're beginning to grasp the basics of chemical production..
Proficiency progressed - The proper understanding of safe chemical synthesization and how to clean your tools used for the next batch..
Proficiency progressed - The process of separating two mixed liquids by their different boiling points..
Proficiency progressed - An understanding of the chemistry of metalworking and alloys..
Proficiency progressed - An understanding of how to produce various natural and chemical substances pure enough for human consumption..
Proficiency progressed - You've done enough cooking to know the basics about how to quickly and efficiently sort your ingredients..
Proficiency progressed - You're quite skilled at culinary knife work, making you noticeably faster at preparing meals that involve a lot of chopping..
Proficiency progressed - You know the basics of baking - proportions, leavening, and things - and are less likely to make a dramatic mistake when working from memory..
Proficiency progressed - You've baked enough bread to consider yourself an expert.  May your yeast be ever frothy..
Proficiency progressed - Anyone can make a cookie, but you can make it look amazing.  Cakes and other fluffies are also no longer a barrier..
Proficiency progressed - You could have been a professional baker before the Cataclysm.  Your profiteroles are the envy of the wastelands..
Proficiency progressed - Anyone can toss stuff into deep fryer oil.  You know more about selecting oil, keeping the food from burning, and the like..
Proficiency progressed - You know enough about deep frying breads and batters to do it easily without thinking about it..
Proficiency progressed - You know the vaunted secrets of creating delicious deep fried sweets..
Proficiency progressed - The basics of fermenting for human consumption, including sanitary technique, avoiding harmful molds, and identifying common problems..
Proficiency progressed - Applying the science of distillation to alcoholic beverages to get something tasty..
Proficiency progressed - The fine art of brewing grains into beers..
Proficiency progressed - The knowledge of how to turn sugary fruits, and occasionally vegetables, into fermented beverages..
Proficiency progressed - The microbiology of most non-alcoholic fermented edibles, from sauerkraut to sourdough..
Proficiency progressed - The basics of curdling and coagulating milk and similar things without the wrong kinds of bacteria and mold winning out..
Proficiency progressed - Taking the basics of curdled milk and making it delicious..
Proficiency progressed - The basic knowledge of ways to keep food safe for long periods of time in a post-refrigeration world..
Proficiency progressed - Using salt, smoke, and similar agents to cure or dehydrate food..
Proficiency progressed - Using pressure canning or tinning to safely store food in sealed containers..
Proficiency progressed - You know the secrets of cooking tasty food using strange substitutions and weird things you found in a cabinet in an abandoned house..
Proficiency progressed - Cooking with foraged ingredients that you wouldn't find in most cookbooks..
Proficiency progressed - An understanding of the skills and tools needed to create durable, effective soldered electrical connections..
Proficiency progressed - Practical experience building electrical circuits, and a grasp of the principles of electrical continuity, current, voltage, and resistance..
Proficiency progressed - Basic working knowledge of using semiconductors such as diodes and transistors in electrical circuits, for switching or amplifying electrical signals..
Proficiency progressed - Familiarity with the role of IC chips in circuit design, and ability to identify many common pre-Cataclysm ICs and understand how to use them in functional circuits..
Proficiency progressed - A practical working knowledge of electromagnetic fields and their creation and application..

Proficiency progressed - An understanding of how to use high voltage, low-current devices to cause debilitating muscle spasms.  Includes some theoretical knowledge of how to protect yourself from these..
Proficiency progressed - A basic understanding of how guns are put together and what tools and materials are needed for the job..
Proficiency progressed - You've become an expert at putting together guns and launchers from makeshift parts..
Proficiency progressed - You're specifically skilled at building and repairing antique guns..
Proficiency progressed - Similar to bowyery, the art of making guns that are powered by elastic mechanisms..
Proficiency progressed - You've got the know-how to make a classic Western revolver, and its many variants..
Proficiency progressed - You know how to bandage wounds and understand basic principles of wound care..
Proficiency progressed - Your extensive field experience in bandaging and wound care is on par with that of a paramedic..
Proficiency progressed - You have some basic understanding of how burns work and (potentially) how they could be treated..
Proficiency progressed - Maintaining and building simple engines..
Proficiency progressed - You know how to safely and efficiently build, repair, maintain and use various appliances that make use of high pressure..
Proficiency progressed - You know how to safely and efficiently build, repair, maintain and use various complex machinery that makes use of chemical processes..
Proficiency progressed - Maintaining and building compressed-air powered machines..
Proficiency progressed - A basic understanding of the properties of metal as a material, and the concepts behind smithing, die casting, and other metalworking techniques..
Proficiency progressed - A basic understanding of the different types of welding, welding tools and fuels, how to weld different materials, and more..
Proficiency progressed - You are an experienced welder..
Proficiency progressed - The craft of working metal into tools and other items of use..
Proficiency progressed - Working copper and bronze shares a lot of techniques with blacksmithing, but the more ductile copper-containing metals have a trick all their own..
Proficiency progressed - How to make jewelry from precious metals like gold and silver..
Proficiency progressed - How to make articulated armor from pieces of metal..
Proficiency progressed - How to fabricate sharp and reliable blades from scratch..

Proficiency progressed - How to make high-quality tools and parts by hand.  Includes techniques like threading, durable articulation points, and using appropriate metals for appropriate tasks.  Also applies to making blunt instruments that can withstand a severe beating without distortion..
Proficiency progressed - How to turn raw ingots and metals into usable wire.  Includes both drawing and extruding..
Proficiency progressed - Heating steel packed in charcoal at high temperatures to cause a hard case of higher carbon steel around the lower carbon core..
Proficiency progressed - Quenching involves repeatedly heating the steel, quenching it in water, then tempering it to create extremely tough metal..
Proficiency progressed - You know the basic principles of turning stones into more useful tools..
Proficiency progressed - You've banged rocks together so much and for so long, you've become extremely fast at it..
Proficiency progressed - Working with glass and heat without poisoning or perforating yourself..
Proficiency progressed - Working with pipes and pipe fittings to transport fluids without leakage..
Proficiency progressed - Basic pottery, from shaping to working with slip to fuse pieces..
Proficiency progressed - The ability to make durable, effective bows..
Proficiency progressed - The skill involved in making arrows that fly true..
Proficiency progressed - Forming coarse fibers into shapes..
Proficiency progressed - Adding glazes to pottery to make them waterproof..

Proficiency progressed - Working with plastic using your hands, including carving, molding, and gluing it.  You know how to identify thermoplastics that are suitable for mold casting, and how to identify the right plastic for the right job..
Proficiency progressed - Shaping wood, bone, and similar materials with a cutting implement..
Proficiency progressed - Before the Cataclysm, you were a helicopter pilot.  Now, you just hope you can fly again..
Proficiency progressed - You've been trained and certified to repair aircraft.  You're not really sure how that could help you survive now..
Proficiency progressed - How to add gemstones to jewelry..
Proficiency progressed - You know how to accurately measure powder and projectile weights for reloading firearm cartridges..
Proficiency progressed - You're skilled at clearing obstacles; terrain like railings or counters are as easy for you to move on as solid ground..
Proficiency progressed - A base knowledge of how to put together and take apart common appliances, diagnose problems, and replace parts..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies that help target weak points on specific creatures..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for scientific understanding and working with certain chemicals and substances..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for cooking and food preparation, as well as experience with food handling tools..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for building and maintaining electronics and powered devices..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for creating and modifying projectile weapons..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for treating injuries and general health care knowledge..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for building and maintaining vehicles, engines, and similar equipment..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for welding, casting and shaping metal..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for creating and modifying wood-based crafts..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for lockpicking, cracking safes, and general tinkering..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for surviving out in the wild..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for all things bow and arrows.  Includes knowledge and experience of making and modifying bows, as well as archery form and posture..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for various domain-specific crafts..
Proficiency progressed - Proficiencies for sewing, binding and mending fabrics and clothing materials..
Proficiency progressed - Making flexible items out of hard materials is tricky.  You've done enough of it to understand how to make smoothly articulated joints out of rigid or semi-rigid materials..
Proficiency progressed - You are familiar with the adjustments and tricks needed to make properly functional buttons, zippers, and other closures on garments..
Proficiency progressed - You know how to make garments and fabric containers sealed against water..
Proficiency progressed - Making elastic bands is easy enough, but making a whole garment from stretchy cloth takes a bit of finesse.  You're good at it..
Proficiency progressed - Like a magical elf, you've learned how to construct footwear by hand..
Proficiency progressed - The art of spinning fiber into thread..
Proficiency progressed - You've learned how to use a loom to produce sheets of fabric from thread..
Proficiency progressed - Like a solitary mouse, you've learned how to construct hats by hand..
Proficiency progressed - Knitting, one of the oldest ways of tying knots in fiber until it is fabric..

Proficiency progressed - You have knitted and knitted and knitted some more, and have the consistent string tension to show for it.  When you get going, the clicking of your needles is like a metronome..
Proficiency progressed - You've got a basic familiarity with how to work with leather, furs, hides, and similar materials..
Proficiency progressed - Working with leather requires a specific set of skills and tools a set you are familiar with..
Proficiency progressed - Working with fur and faux fur is a skill all its own..
Proficiency progressed - It seems unlikely that anyone prior to the Cataclysm knew how to work with the shells of giant bugs as well as you do now..
Proficiency progressed - Turning sheets of chain links into effective, wearable clothing that doesn't bind up..
Proficiency progressed - You know the tricks for working with Kevlar, Nomex, and other advanced polymer cloth..
Proficiency progressed - You know how to pick a lock, at least in theory..
Proficiency progressed - You can pick a lock in the dark, blindfolded.  Although that doesn't make it all that much harder.  You're good at locks, OK?.
Proficiency progressed - Opening safes is an exacting skill, one that you are proficient at..
Proficiency progressed - You know the basics of setting and taking down traps safely..
Proficiency progressed - You're specifically quite skilled at setting effective traps..
Proficiency progressed - You know how to take down a trap safely..
Proficiency progressed - You are skilled at spotting things out of the ordinary, like traps or ambushes..
Proficiency progressed - Very basic familiarity with various types of undead creatures..
Proficiency progressed - Very basic familiarity with various types of demihuman creatures..
Proficiency progressed - You are familiar with the common anatomy of these purpose-built abominations, as far as they have one..
Proficiency progressed - Understanding of man-made armors and ways to exploit them.  You're able to find openings in certain kinds of body armor..
Proficiency progressed - You're somewhat familiar with naturally armored creatures.  You're able to find openings in certain kinds of hardened shells..
Proficiency progressed - You're somewhat familiar with cybernetic creatures.  You're able to find openings and gaps that aren't as hardened..
Proficiency progressed - Basic familiarity with various types of birds..
Proficiency progressed - Basic familiarity with various types of insects, arachnids, and worms..
Proficiency progressed - You are familiar with the anatomy of mutated beetles - bypassing their thick armor should be easier..
Proficiency progressed - You are familiar with the anatomy of mutated centipedes, letting you target their less-deadly parts with ease..

Proficiency progressed - Familiarity with the comparative anatomy of mutant Hymenopterans - ants, bees, and wasps of all kinds.  You find it easier to exploit their weak points, and possibly disable their natural weaponry..
Proficiency progressed - You are familiar with the anatomy of mutated spiders of all shapes and sizes..
Proficiency progressed - Basic understanding of what's needed for certain creatures to fly, as well as ways of preventing it..
Proficiency progressed - You're familiar with creatures presenting unsettling bones on their outer structure..
Proficiency progressed - You have some practice in fighting small humanoids like children.  You don't necessarily feel good about it..
Proficiency progressed - You have some practice in fighting large hulking humanoids.  You're better at reaching certain weak points..
Proficiency progressed - You've got a basic grasp of the theory of how to twist and arrange fibers into a more durable cord..
Proficiency progressed - Making twisted fibers into durable and useful rope..
Proficiency progressed - You're familiar with the theory behind turning raw hides into leather..
Proficiency progressed - You have a lot of practice and experience with processing hides to leather, as well as related techniques like making boiled leather..
Proficiency progressed - You have grasped some basic understanding on archery, and find handling bows easier..
Proficiency progressed - After significant practice, you have become an expert in the movements used in drawing and firing a bow, and have strengthened those muscles considerably..

Proficiency progressed - You have drawn and fired a bow so many times, you probably have a bit of a twist in your spine from it.  You've developed what would once have been a world class understanding of the pose and motion of effective archery..
Proficiency progressed - Simple projects involving holding planks and panels of wood together with nails or similar fasteners..
